name: Hexworld
description:

*Khm*. Splitting it apart. And all hope will be lost, if not for our heroes, queen Annie Reagal Azure and
- RON PERLIN!
Yes, your majesty?
- Firstly, It was 10 days ago.
Oh. I am working on my memoirs. It would be a magnificent magical spectacle about the royal queen and her brave court mage...
- Secondly, the queen would royally appreciate if her mage would watch the aether streams because we are going into vortex.
Oops. Sorry, your majesty. Right away,

Gameplay

Venture into the far reaches of the aether sea to reclaim the broken land. Control your island, crash into and fight the enemy factions, capture their hexes, buildings and resources - and then make the best use of them while managing your kingdom in this unique RTS.


Features

  • Cute little hexagon islands! Build your own empire on the island floating in the aether
  • Many unique unit types! Collect some low level unit barracks to get immediate power boost, or pick the rare lair you will only be able to employ later? Your choice!
  • Make building combos! Merge low-tier spawners and put special buildings nearby to make the most efficient army utilizing limited resources and space
  • Auto battles between numerous armies! Use magic spells, skills and siege buildings to help in combat.
  • Keyboard-controlled RTS just as you all like (but this time we actually added mouse support!)
